meanings.sent1: The acajous in the forest provide shade and shelter for many animals.
meanings.sent2: I learned about acajous in my science class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey swung from the acajous, causing the birds to scatter in surprise.
meanings.sent4: The acajous stood tall like guardians of the jungle, their branches reaching towards the sky.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green leaves of the acajous danced in the gentle breeze, creating a mesmerizing sight.

meanings.definition: The reddish-brown wood of the acajou tree.
meanings.sent1: The craftsman carved intricate designs into the acajous to create beautiful furniture.
meanings.sent2: The acajous were used to build sturdy houses in the village.
meanings.sent3: The artist painted a stunning landscape on a piece of acajous, bringing the wood to life.
meanings.sent4: The rich aroma of the acajous filled the workshop, inspiring creativity in all who worked there.
meanings.sent5: The smooth texture of the acajous made it a favorite choice for crafting elegant decorations.
